statements: DELETE FROM instruments_on_loan WHERE musician_id = 10 AND loan_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM instruments_on_loan WHERE instrument_id = 101 AND musician_id = 201
DELETE FROM instruments_on_loan WHERE musician_id = 201 AND loan_date = '2023-01-15'
DELETE FROM musicians WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM instruments WHERE id = 1 AND type = 'guitar';
DELETE FROM musicians WHERE instrument_id IN (SELECT id FROM instruments WHERE is_on_loan = TRUE);
